oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The !kw i !kw i, the Mantis, and the Children. The !kw i !kw i, who was formerly a man, and is now a bird (in appearance somewhat resembling a 'duiker'), comes, during the absence of their parents, to kill the children. They are defended by the Mantis, who causes the death of !kw i !kw i. By /han kass o (L VIII.
6333). A note to the above story was also given by /han kass o (L VIII.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !kwai !kwai, the Mantis and the children A note to the story of
